constraints.name: gcd_constraint
constraints.description: 两个整数的最大公约数必须为1（互质约束）

constraints.name: sequence_property
constraints.description: 序列中的每个元素对 $(x + i, y + i)$ 必须满足互质约束
constraints.formal: forall i in [0, k]: gcd(x + i, y + i) = 1

constraints.name: chain_length
constraints.description: 链的长度由满足互质约束的连续元素对数量决定
constraints.formal: length = k + 1 where (x + k, y + k) is the last pair satisfying gcd(x + k, y + k) = 1
